name: @peaske/claude-tracker
description: Claude Desktop chat history tracker with ENV file integration and JSONL storage

tools.name: start_env_tracking
tools.description: Start tracking chat history to specified project's .env file

tools.name: add_to_env
tools.description: Add conversation content to project's .env file in real-time

tools.name: finalize_env_session
tools.description: Complete the chat session and add summary to .env file

tools.name: rotate_env_backup
tools.description: Create weekly backup of .env file and clean up old entries

tools.name: get_env_tracking_status
tools.description: Check current tracking status and recent .env entries
